text: what unites the Italian composer pini's
last opera tur and do known to many
thanks to the aonomus
[Music]
Arya and a poem written by the
philosopher and romantic poet naami gen
born in 12th century in genja currently
the second biggest town in
aeran the plot while pini's inspiration
from Fredick Fila and car lotti's plays
has been numerously mentioned in
literature the original source of the
Opera Story coming from an 1197 nizami's
halfar poem is not widely
known halfar originally translated from
Far SE at seven Beauties is also known
as baham Nam after the name of the
protagonist the sesanian Persian Empire
ruler baham I and isami himself was
inspired by fosi Shak Nam or the book of
Kings however in naam's work the focus
is on King Bam's personal life rather
than his military success the poet
depicts baham as a hedonistic ruler who
dedicates most of his time to his
favorite activity hunting one day he
wanders off on his own into the forest
and gets lost all of a sudden he finds
himself next to the ruins of a big
castle and the entrance to a cave while
walking through the cave his gaze is
captured by portraits of seven Beauties
each of them being unique and luring
baham forgets everything in the world
and becomes obsessed with the idea of
possessing all the seven ladies love his
decision on finding and marrying them is
unflinching as he discovers his own
portrait in the middle this is a omen he
will build each one of the mastle as
unique as their respective Beauty are
you still wondering the link with the
tanote we are almost there after
successfully making all seven Beauties
the king's wives he forgets everything
including ruling his own kingdom and
instead spends his time in the company
of the ladies he dedicates each day of
the week to visit each wife's personal
Castle to listen to auring love story
before falling asleep in a Beauty's
embrace
not only that the seven Beauties were
from various parts of the world but also
they had different idea of what love is
and which color it is associated with
for instance the love story of the
Slavic princess that she narrated to
King baham on Tuesday is about the color
red the symbol of the blood shed by many
great men aspiring for the attention and
love of a princess the most beautiful
and wise princess in the world
cruel and demanding to her future
husband so demanding was she that if one
did not know the answers to her riddles
she would take his life because of all
those men dying for the princess's love
the color red had been associated with
cruelty until a young pth laavan decided
to seek revenge for all those good and
brave men dressed in red representing
his bravery he was the first to solve
her drinks and thus win her heart and
save his own life to celebrate their
love the couple chose red as their lucky
color to wear all the time red is the
color of the burning blood in veins the
blush on one's cheeks in red one finds
happiness only red roses are truly
beautiful include Slavic princess in her
fable
[Music]
most probably this story was included by
franois ptit dequa to his thousand and
one day later an Italian writer gosi
took it as an inspiration for a comedy
play turandot which in turn induced
shillo to come up with his own
interpretation of the story turendot the
Princess of China in 1801 the latter
triggered pini's interest in working on
the Opera in 1920 the labretto was
written by Renato Simon and ji adami who
referred to gods's play Pini passed away
before finishing the Opera which was
premiered posthumously on the night of
the 25th of April 1926 in Milan's
lascala
theater almost a century after its
Premiere pini's tendot is still
performed in the world's leading Opera
Houses yet the genius of naami to whom
the origins of the story should be
attributed is still to be discovered by
many opera and literature lovers seven
Beauties is only one of many works by
naami gen whose Persian writings made
him known Way Beyond his hometown of
genja unprecedented for that period
naami attributes a central role to women
in most of his work naam's women
inspired men to Great deeds and personal
growth they were wise and influential
and had strong
personalities leel from leel imagon Love
Story exemplifies His Image in eastern
literature whereas in hro and Shirin
naami narrates the rise and fall of a
man inconsistency in the Deeds of the
ruler hro opposed to shirin's wisdom and
spiritual Purity the treasury of
mysteries is full of eloquent metaphors
and similes that have never been used
before and in isander Nami naami
introduces the idea of a utopian society
centuries before Thomas Moore and
Campanella
did naami gen is one of the symbols of
Eastern wisdom and poetic eloquence one
of the rare examples of early
multiculturalism in the history of
humankind whose Timeless and
geographical reach has influenced
countless Generations
[Music]
